nodes.bodyText:
It would be nice to have this tested at a lower level but the disk sync code is definitely not ready for that. For another day.
Honestly it feels like getting a disk (and Google Drive) based  implementation of FormApi together would solve a lot of problems. Then code to add and sync forms could be shared between all these sources. I've added a note to STATE.md about this.
My thinking is we need a migration here as we already have version 9 of the database out in the wild.

This migration won't actually carry over the state from the old deleted column. My assumption is that it's ok for beta users to have their form "restored" if they'd already soft deleted it when they install the update.
Yes, fine by me. @opendatakit/testers note that this is expected.
